content: 5 double_crochet decrease* repeat from * to * around join round 13 ch3 skip first double_crochet double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet double_crochet 2 decrease *double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet decrease* repeat from * to * around join round 14 repeat round 13 beret should now fit head snugly but not tightly if not work another decrease row decrease after 4 double_crochet or rip out the last decrease row whichever seems appropriate round 15 ch3 skip first double_crochet *fpdc front post double_crochet around next double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet* repeat from * to * around join round 16 ch3 skip first double_crochet *fpdc around next fpdc double_crochet in next double_crochet* repeat from * to * around join fasten off and weave in ends
